text: Frenzy is a 1972 British crime thriller movie set in London. It is directed by Alfred Hitchcock starring Jon Finch and Barry Foster. It tells the story of an innocent man, played by Finch who is wrongly believed to be a serial killer by the police and his efforts to avoid capture and bring the real killer to justice. This was the second to last movie that Hitchcock made before he died in 1980 and the first time in many years he had made a movie in the United Kingdom. ==References== ===Further reading=== * * ==Other websites== * * Category:1972 crime thriller movies Category:1970s horror thriller movies Category:1970s serial killer movies Category:British crime thriller movies Category:British horror movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies directed by Alfred Hitchcock Category:Movies set in London Category:Rape in movies Category:Movies about miscarriage of justice Category:Universal Pictures movies
title: Frenzy
